entry.title: $2500 // It is yours to enjoy-perfectly located in the heart of Chelsea
entry.content:
Artfully designed and perfectly located in the heart of Chelsea, this exquisite residence has been impeccably architected and finely decorated for the ultimate living pleasure. It is yours to enjoy whether as a premier NYC pied-a-terre, a Chelsea dream home, or a fantastic investor opportunity with excellent ROI.
The supreme address is a mere block from The Highline, 2 blocks from Hudson River Park, and adjacent to Meatpacking, West Chelsea, the West Village and Flatiron. Great restaurants, jazz clubs, nightlife, gourmet food markets, cinemas, and the top downtown schools and colleges are all at your disposal, minutes away.
